HMAM.TA.summary: Hamama Meir Trading (1996) Ltd. engages in the import and distribution of raw materials for the food industry in Israel. The company offers grains, pulses, nuts, dried fruits, seeds and herbs, coffee, and animal feed. It serves food conglomerates, wholesalers and distributors, small and medium-sized natural food stores, and health food shops. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Bnei Brak, Israel.

SMNIN.TA.summary: Shemen Industries Ltd manufactures, markets, and sells industrial products and raw materials for industry and livestock customers in Israel. The company operates in two segments, Food and Agro Food Sector. It offers edible oils and other food products to the consumer, domestic, and institutional markets; and tuna products under the Olive Tree brand. The company was founded in 1919 and is based in Haifa, Israel.
